text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ nzuai, “O, Zerusarem, O, Zerusarem, ndu the Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi shogim, mbe vhɨzgim, ndu mba Fhe Bakɨme sasarigi zi gumgi, ndu mbe ndiav ŋkɨɨar mbe sim, mbe vhɨzgi. Gu tugi vhɨrvera, ndun tari, gu mbe ndiav tuara meeŋ won ŋgugi ndi mbarɨva vhui tɨvar mben muun za mbui. Gu maaŋ mbe mbuim, mbe thamthagi.
